text: Robin Chandler Duke (born Grace Esther Tippett; October 13, 1923 â€“ February 6, 2016) was an American socialite, journalist, women's rights advocate and diplomat. She served as the United States Ambassador to Norway from September 12, 2000 until March 1, 2001. Duke was born in Baltimore, Maryland. She was married to actor Jeffrey Lynn and later diplomat Angier Biddle Duke until his death in 1995. She had three children. Duke died on February 6, 2016 in Charleston, South Carolina. She was aged 92. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American activists Category:American diplomats Category:Journalists from Maryland Category:American socialites Category:Disease-related deaths in South Carolina Category:Writers from Baltimore Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Norway Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Robin Chandler Duke
